sentences.en: A battery is the intentional application of force to another person.
sentences.cn: 殴打是对另一人故意施加的暴力.

sentences.en: Allowance , An intentional difference in sizes of two mating parts.
sentences.cn: 两个配件之间的预留的尺寸差.

sentences.en: Civil disobedience, violent or non-violent, is intentional law breaking.
sentences.cn: 公民抗命，不管是暴力还是非暴力的，都是故意犯法。

sentences.en: Criminals responsibility shall be borne for intentional crimes.
sentences.cn: 故意犯罪,应当负刑事责任.

sentences.en: Have intentional place disease calculate the obstacle not to calculate mental disease?
sentences.cn: 患有心境障碍抑郁症算不算精神病?

sentences.en: How can I blame him? It wasn't intentional.
sentences.cn: 我怎么能怪他呢？那又不是有意的。

sentences.en: I did trip him, but it wasn’t intentional.
sentences.cn: 我的确把他绊倒了，但不是故意的。

sentences.en: I'm sorry I left you off the list—it wasn't intentional.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉没把你列在名单里—我不是有意的。

sentences.en: Let me assure you that it was not intentional.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证那不是故意的.

sentences.en: She looked at him closely to see if his evasiveness was intentional.
sentences.cn: 她端详着他，想要知道他是否故意回避。

sentences.en: They also showed intentional acts, like stepping on another person s foot.
sentences.cn: 也显示有故意行为, 比如踩他人的脚.

sentences.en: This thesis of intentional directedness was the hallmark of Brentano's descriptive psychology.
sentences.cn: 这个意向导向的命题就是布伦塔诺描述心理学的标志.

sentences.en: When you're an egoist, none of the harm you do is intentional.
sentences.cn: 当你是个利己主义者时, 你做的任何伤害都不是故意的.

sentences.en: Women who are the victims of intentional discrimination will be able to get compensation.
sentences.cn: 受到故意歧视的女性将会得到赔偿。

sentences.en: You really think this is due to some - some intentional interference of Lawrence Leffers's.
sentences.cn: 你真的以为这事是因为劳伦斯·莱弗茨的某种一某种蓄意的干预.

words.tran_cn: 有目的的,计划的,商议的,考虑的,预计的

trans.tran_en: done deliberately and usually intended to cause harm
